# Contributing to Shipping Calculator

ðŸŽ‰ Thanks for taking the time to contribute! We welcome your help to improve the Shipping Calculator application.

## How to Contribute

1. **Fork the Repository**  
   Click the "Fork" button at the top right of the repository page.

2. **Clone Your Fork**  
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/shipping_calculator.git
   cd shipping_calculator
